title: A Challenging Psoriasis Journey
description: Carin Bennett shares her frustrations with getting diagnosed and accessing treatment for palmoplantar pustulosis, and rare and difficult to treat type of psoriasis.
cleaned_text: November 06, 2021 Recent Advance Articles Carin Bennett shares her challenges and frustrations with pustular psoriasis and PsA.
